Pre-Game Insights: The Detroit Tigers (74-71) will take on the Colorado Rockies (54-91) on Thursday, September 12, 2024, at Comerica Park in Detroit, MI.
The starting pitchers will be Ryan Feltner for the Rockies and Tarik Skubal for the Tigers.
The odds on this game have Colorado at +152 while Detroit is coming in at -184.
The total is set at O8.5.
Colorado has a slugging rate of .397 and has been called out on strikes 1,434 times, while being walked on 404 occasions.
The Rockies have accumulated 246 doubles as a squad and have hit 157 home runs.
The Rockies have a team ERA of 5.44 this year, which is 30th in baseball.
The Detroit Tigers have a team slugging percentage of .387 and they score 4.27 runs per contest, ranking 17th in MLB.
Detroit's pitching staff has given up 586 runs on the season while having an ERA of 3.66, ranking 6th in the league.
